segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a little anxious watching how close she is to the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange how she can be so absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Beyond her, I notice two children plotting a secretive heist of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks quite determined but dangerously perched on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder if she’ll notice the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A part of me wants to intervene, to shout a warning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I think about how this is just a typical day in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the garden outside represents a world much calmer than this.
segments.speaker: PAR
